item.title: LSP Setup for Java
item.description: Update on <2023-06-07 Wed> Found a much easier way to configure this and tried again with the update-to-date lsp-java and it worked magically. Can’t recall why I had configuration issues before. Simply it would be: Make sure JDK 17 is installed (According to the requirement of lsp-java). Create a lib folder and put .jar files into it (or symlinks). See this issue. Run lsp-restart-workspace. Voila! Now LSP works as you would expect :).
